description.ko: 가상 생태계에서 영원히 피어나는 디지털 정원을 묘사하며 기술과 생물학의 시적인 융합을 보여줍니다.
description.en: A poetic fusion of technology and biology, depicting a digital garden that blooms forever in a virtual ecosystem.

prompt: A macro cinematic shot of 'FLORA-9', a hybrid orchid with petals made of #89CFF0 iridescent fractal code and translucent glass veins. The flower blooms from a #50C878 mossy motherboard, releasing #4A0E4E binary-coded pollen that glows with #FFB6C1 light. Intricate subsurface scattering on the glass foliage, soft bokeh background, eternal spring of a digital garden, 8k, Octane Render.
